sentences: Jordan Michael Houston III (born April 5, 1975), known professionally as Juicy J, is an American rapper and record producer from Memphis, Tennessee.

sentences: He is a founding member of the Southern hip hop group Three 6 Mafia, established in 1991, with whom he won an Academy Award for Best Original Song, for their single "It's Hard out Here for a Pimp".
